segments.text: Oh that ’ s a lovely necklace .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you . My husband gave it to me .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh I didn ’ t know you were married .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes I am . I got married five years ago .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh I see . That ’ s nice . Did you meet your husband at work ?
segments.speaker: S1
